summary: This mod allows you to add at your Archmagerobe some ironplates.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
You can decide to craft an light or an heavy armor. If you want, you can too add some pauldrons. light and heavy gloves as well as an helmet is too added by this mod.
To craft them you need to have the normal archmagerobe. If you have sold it or dont want to do the whole magesguildquest, you can find a archmagerobe in the midden worn by an skeleton. This mod too makes the Archmage hood and the robe
separate. You can find the hood in the Arch-mage´s quarters. At the moment there is no female version of this armor. You can find the armorimprovements at the forge in the categorie iron.

And don´t forget to endorse it if you like it ;)

Bug:
There is a small bug with the handtextures from the light gloves. It could be that this texture get screwed up. To fix it you need to reequip the gloves.

Credits:
 hothtrooper44: For his tips to creat the armor
 L0rdOfWar: For his cool chainmailarmor
 Dejawolf: For the awesome Vendelhelmet
 MaGlas: For the general design of the Armor
author: MaGlas
